name: bFunnyWars
description:
Tactical game with bunnys, multiplayer on the same pc, move and attack the enemy's bunny, if you put near three of your Bunnys you gotta a better and bigger Bunny, increase your Bunny army.
Bun ny ou need to remember every Bunny counts.

Have Bugs puts its playable nearly 80% of the times to finish a party.
Only needed a mouse not a Bunny XD.
